author: @rte
title: Video | Ireland try v Fiji | RTÉ
text: Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try against Fiji Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try, however, they lost by four points to Fiji in Paris. [Sport](/video/category/Sport)Share More Clips [ 01:01 ](/video/id/12827) Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try against Fiji Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try, however, they lost by four points to Fiji in Paris.Sport [ 02:11 ](/video/id/12844) Paris 2024: Team Ireland expects as Paris prepares to put on a show Paul O'Flynn reports from Paris and speaks to Team Ireland members ahead of tonight's Olympic opening ceremonySport [ 03:03 ](/video/id/12846) Paris 2024: 'Aoife O’Rourke for a gold' | Kenneth Egan backs Ireland's boxers to thrive Beijing 2008 silver medalist Kenneth Egan speaks to RTÉ Sport's Raf Diallo at the Team Ireland flagbearer event at the Irish Cultural Centre in Paris as the boxing contingent prepare for the start of competition at this summer's Olympics.Sport [ 01:01 ](/video/id/12827) Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try against Fiji Chay Mullins scores Ireland's opening try, however, they lost by four points to Fiji in Paris.Sport [ 02:24 ](/video/id/12825) Hugo Keenan reflects on the narrow defeat to New Zealand "We could've and should've put them away..." - Hugo Keenan reflects on the narrow defeat to New Zealand.Sport [ 00:59 ](/video/id/12823) Ireland's first try against New Zealand scored by Zac Ward Ireland's first try against New ZealandSport [ 01:01 ](/video/id/12828) Fiji winning try Waisea Nacuqu races in to score Fiji's match-winning try as the reigning champions moved into the semi-finals.Sport [ 01:05 ](/video/id/12824) Ngarohi McGarvey-Black NZ try New Zealand's match-winning try against Ireland to top the groupSport [ 03:40 ](/video/id/12822) Paris 2024: Ireland's canoeists step up the prep Team Ireland's four-strong contingent of canoeists and kayakers were being put through their paces this morning as the start of their Olympics competitions looms on Saturday. RTÉ Sport's Raf Diallo speaks to Team Leader and Canoeing Ireland High Performance Director Jon Mackey at the Nautical Stadium in Vaires-sur-Marne which will host both canoeing and rowing competitions.Sport [ 02:19 ](/video/id/12816) Harry McNulty savours sevens' perfect start Ireland rugby sevens captain Harry McNulty praised his team afte they began their Olympic Games with two wins out of two.Sport [ 00:53 ](/video/id/12814) Paris 2024: Terry Kennedy opens the scoring against Japan Terry Kennedy opens the scoring against Japan in Ireland's second Rugby Sevens outing at OlympicsSport [ 01:01 ](/video/id/12815) Paris 2024: Harry McNulty intercepts a pass to get first try of second half v Japan Harry McNulty intercepts a pass to get first try of second half v Japan in rugby sevensSport [ 01:04 ](/video/id/12812) Paris 2024: Terry Kennedy seals Ireland's 10-5 win over South Africa in rugby sevens Terry Kennedy seals Ireland's 10-5 win over South Africa in rugby sevensSport [ 00:30 ](/video/id/12810) Paris 2024: Argentina's 106th-minute equaliser against Morocco ruled out hours after game suspended Cristian Medina of Argentina equalises against Morocco in the 106th minute but the goal was ruled out by VAR following a lengthy suspensionSport [ 00:57 ](/video/id/12811) Paris 2024: Jordan Conroy gives Ireland lead in rugby sevens against South Africa Jordan Conroy gives Ireland lead in rugby sevens against South AfricaSport [ 05:17 ](/video/id/12807) Paris 2024: Paul O'Donovan staying grounded as history beckons Ireland's reigning Olympic champions Paul O'Donovan and Fintan McCarthy will lead the medal charge in Paris. Not that the gifted rowers would frame it in such terms.Sport [ 04:05 ](/video/id/12800) Let the Games begin: Olympics ready for lift-off Ireland men's rugby 7s team will be in action on Wednesday as the Paris Games begin in earnest.Sport [ 06:33 ](/video/id/12793) Jordan Conroy Jordan Conroy says that Ireland are full of confidence heading into the Olympics, but it is a case of one game at a time for the Sevens side.Sport [ 05:56 ](/video/id/12792) Topping sets sights on podium finish Ireland Men's Sevens boss James Topping on Paris 2024Sport [ 08:17 ](/video/id/12790) Sevens star Harry McNulty on Paris hopes Ireland's Harry McNulty looks ahead to the Olympic GamesSport
